pages.text: Toads can be found in jungles and swamps, jumping happily around. When killed, Toads will drop Slimeballs.$(br2)Toads can be tamed with Fermented Spider Eyes, and bred with Normal Spider Eyes.

A Toad $(l:bewitchment:rituals/binding)Familiar$() grants the witch that bound it enhanced positive status effects.$(br2)Killing arthropods will also heal such witches by a quarter of their maximum health.
